snippet: A concert in the New York Philharmonic’s Contact! series at the Met offered a program of works by Elliott Carter, Michael Jarrell and Pierre Boulez.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert featuring premiere by Elliott Carter and works by Michael Jarrell and Pierre Boulez, performed by the New York Philharmonic at the Metropolitan Museum of Art as part of its Contact! series.
lead_paragraph: A concert in the New York Philharmonic’s Contact! series at the Met offered a program of works by Elliott Carter, Michael Jarrell and Pierre Boulez.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic’s Contact! Series at the Met
headline.main: Poems in Four Voices, a Concerto in Two
headline.print_headline: Presenting Poems in Four Voices, a Concerto in Two
